info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 16 at 5:00PM EDT until August 16 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia SC
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following county, Orangeburg.
* WHEN...Until 600 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, Claflin College, South Carolina State University, Edisto Gardens, Orangeburg County Airport, Cordova, Wilkinson Heights, Prince of Orange Mall and Edisto. - This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 143 and 151. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don't drown.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING
